sentences.sContent: When Willie tapped on the window, Miguel gave an involuntary jump.
sentences.sCn: 威利敲了敲窗户，米格尔不由自主地跳了起来。

synos.tran: 无意识的；自然而然的；不知不觉的

remMethod.val: in(无) + volunt(意识) + ary → 无意的

words.tran: 无心地；不自觉地；偶然地

trans.tranOther: an involuntary movement, sound, reaction etc is one that you make suddenly and without intending to because you cannot control yourself
